thread.title: Clinton Defends Her Emails During Benghazi Hearing
thread.title_full: Clinton Defends Her Emails During Benghazi Hearing

author: Susie Madrak
title: Clinton Defends Her Emails During Benghazi Hearing
text:
sharethis 10/22/15 12:00pm Rep. Trey Gowdy, R-S.C., the chairman of the congressional panel charged with investigating the deadly 2012 attack on the U.S. Consulate in Benghazi, Libya, squared off Thursday morning with former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton during a high-profile hearing on Capitol Hill. Clinton was being questioned about the series of events that resulted in the deathsâ€¦ Benghazi , Hillary Clinton , Trey Gowdy Comments
